text:
A beautiful thing to see @DrTomFrieden former Director 
@CDCgov cite Poet Laureate @TheAmandaGorman 
in his excellent thread Covid Epi Weekly: Best of Times, Worst of Times re facing challenges of #COVID19 pandemic
"we must hang on" & "2 more mos of (#vaccine) scarcity, at least" https://t.co/zpG9HGMENT
